title: Aarya Studs: Floral Navratna Earrings with Diamond Accent
features: Classic floral design featuring the auspicious Navratna gemstones in a clustered arrangement. The gold setting showcases fine milgrain detailing and an open-back setting to maximize gemstone brilliance. The outer frame is embellished with sparkling cubic zirconia to add a modern touch. These earrings are designed with a sturdy post and screw-back closure for secure wear.
colors: Predominantly gold with a vibrant mix of gemstone colors: ruby red
and cat's eye grey. The CZ stones provide additional sparkle.
occasions: Perfect for festive occasions like Diwali
and Sankranthi. Also suitable for modern events like weddings
and everyday wear. Ideal as a special gift for anniversaries or birthdays.
description: These Aarya studs are a testament to timeless elegance, blending the traditional Navratna concept with contemporary design. The use of high-quality 22K gold and carefully selected gemstones ensures lasting beauty and value. The Navratna stones are believed to bring prosperity, health, and good fortune, making these earrings a meaningful and stylish investment. The Hyderabadi polish adds a luxurious sheen.
